items.name: Cucumber-Dill Salad

items.name: Pasta Bar
items.ingredients: Fresh, customizable pasta dishes with a variety of pasta options, including penne, fettuccine, and cheese tortellini. Choose from sauces like marinara, Alfredo, or pesto, and top your dish with grilled chicken or seasoned beef. Add your choice of toppings, such as grated cheese, sautéed vegetables, and fresh herbs.

items.name: Quesadilla Bar
items.ingredients: Enjoy a customizable quesadilla experience with your choice of fillings, including shredded chicken, seasoned beef, or sautéed vegetables. Each quesadilla is grilled to perfection and served with a variety of toppings such as shredded cheese, guacamole, sour cream, salsa, and jalapeños.

items.name: Mashed Potato Bar
items.ingredients: Indulge in a creamy mashed potato bar where guests can customize their own bowl of fluffy mashed potatoes, made fresh and served with a variety of toppings. Choose from options like gravy, sour cream, shredded cheese, crispy bacon, sautéed onions, and chives. For added variety, we offer mashed sweet potatoes as an alternative.

items.name: Taco Bar
items.ingredients: Let your guests build their own tacos with a selection of fresh fillings, including seasoned ground beef, grilled chicken, and sautéed vegetables. Choose from soft flour tortillas or crunchy corn shells, and top them with a variety of toppings such as shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, guacamole, salsa, and jalapeños. This customizable station also includes sides like Mexican rice, refried beans, and chips for a complete taco experience.

items.name: Nacho Bar
items.ingredients: Create your perfect nacho platter with a variety of crunchy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, seasoned ground beef, or grilled chicken. Guests can customize their nachos with a range of delicious toppings, including guacamole, salsa, sour cream, jalapeños, and fresh cilantro. For added variety, we offer options like black beans, queso dip, and diced tomatoes. This interactive station ensures a fun and flavorful experience for everyone.

items.name: Chaat Station
items.ingredients: Bring the vibrant flavors of Indian street food to your event with a customizable Chaat Station. Guests can build their own chaat with crispy puris, crunchy sev, and a variety of flavorful toppings like spiced potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind chutney, mint chutney, and a sprinkle of tangy spices. Options like bhel puri, pani puri, and dahi puri are available, offering a fresh, flavorful, and interactive experience for everyone.

items.name: Sandwich Station
items.ingredients: Create your own delicious sandwich at our customizable Sandwich Station. Choose from a variety of fresh breads, including rolls, baguettes, and wraps, and fill them with your choice of proteins like roasted turkey, ham, grilled chicken, or vegetarian options like hummus and roasted vegetables. Top it off with a selection of cheeses, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and condiments like mustard, mayo, and pesto. Sides like chips, pasta salad, and pickles are also available to complement your sandwich creation.

items.name: Caprese Skewers
items.ingredients: Fresh mozzarella balls, cherry tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Shrimp Cocktail Shooters
items.ingredients: Chilled shrimp served with classic cocktail sauce in individual shooters.

items.name: Charcuterie Cups

items.name: Fruit Skewers
